citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 am] on 01-
MAR-23. Was able to speak with the licensee who indicated they were unable to facilitate an inspection due to prior
commitments.
End Section
